name: Ginfo Overwatch Edition
description:
Ginfo is the companion app that every Overwatch player needs. Have your Overwatch Profile and Statistics always by your side. Check hero values like damage numbers, cooldowns and more!

Currently the app contains the following infos about Overwatch:
- Overwatch Profile Overview
- General Statistics about your Profile
- Detailed Statistics about all your Heroes
- Hero Damage Values
- Hero Ability Infos and Numbers
- Hero Counters
- Hero Strategy Guides and Tips
- Hero Skins
- Hero Stories
- Overview of all current Overwatch Maps

This app is 100% committed on staying up to date!
Are You With Us?


Overwatch is a trademark of Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. All related videos and images are property and trademark of Blizzard Entertainment. This app is not affiliated with Blizzard Entertainment. No copyright infringement intended.
